Mary Morrison, RN, RPC

About me About counselling Contact information

I am a Registered Nurse and Registered Professional Counsellor with a private counselling practice in Victoria, British Columbia. I have more than 20 years of experience as a Registered Nurse working with children, families, adults, and seniors. I am also a counsellor at the Victoria Women's Transition House Society, and a crisis line volunteer. I am a parent of four grown children and four grandchildren.

I am currently accepting new clients. Please call or email for more information or to make an appointment.

Mary Morrison, RN, RPC is maintained by kathryntmorrison.
